bike.description: Jamis CX Dyad Plus T700/FRP Monocoque Carbon Fiber Frame, FEA optimized Near Net molding process, formed down tube and top tube for comfortable portage with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO386 carbon BB shell, ACE internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, rider tuned twin seat stays with post mount disc mounts and brake strut on non-driveside for vibration-free braking, asymmetrical chainstays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis CX carbon composite fork, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Comp Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Alex ATD490 tubeless-ready disc specific rim, 32H, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
SRAM Apex derailleurs for braze-on front
FSA Gossamer PRO EVO cross double with Press Fit 30, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
TRP HYRD cable actuated hydraulic disc brake with 160mm front; 140mm rear rotors and SRAM Apex brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm(48/51), 420mm(54/56), 440mm(58/61)
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
